meanings.sent3: The piffling argument over who gets the last cookie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His piffling attempts at fixing the leaky faucet only made it worse.
meanings.sent5: The piffling details of the story were easily forgotten.

meanings.definition: To talk or act in a trivial or insignificant way
meanings.sent1: Stop piffling and get to work!
meanings.sent2: He piffled on about the weather for hours.
meanings.sent3: The children piffled around, pretending to be pirates.
meanings.sent4: She piffled through her chores, not really accomplishing anything.
meanings.sent5: The politician piffled through his speech, avoiding the important issues.
